: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus Prime(whisper): Well, they are both enemies that we dont want to have increased numbers. However I'd say the Tripredacus are the lesser of two evils in this case. Our main focus should be to stop the Predacons. 
Rodimus took careful aim at Perceptor's head. 
Rodimus Prime: Pick a target and prepare to fire. 
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Blackfang: Okay... We don't want the Preds to have a new bot in their
group, right? But what about the Tripreds? I know about Tyrael, and
that other guy looks quite strong... I'd hate to be in Perceptor's
shoes actually. You think they'd want to share the newcomers?

He took hold of his energy shotgun and readied two blasts.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> Rodimus Prime: Thank you for your support. Both of you. 
> Rodimus could tell that Nightlight was struggling with something,
she seemed to be in paid. He was about to say something whern they
arrived at the cliff. 
> Rodimus Prime(whisper): Stay quiet, and low. We dont want to be
seen... yet. It's quite the party down there. It will be difficult to
extract the pod. Any ideas? 
> After speaking, Roddy transformes to bot mode, and draws his blaster
from subspace. 
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
Blackfang: I think I see it... It looks like quite a gathering...
> 
> He arrived at the edge of a cliff and loked at the crashed ship and
> saw Tyrael, Perceptor, some Rogues and other bots he did not know.
> There was one who was down on the ground, but he had never seen him
> before.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"
> <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight:
> > 
> > "Count with me too"said Nightlight. She didn't know what it's going 
> > on but now she was starting to feel pain but she tried to hold back 
> > a moan. She tought that soon her upset would dissapear soon.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang: Count me on your side. At least, he seems goal-oriented 
> > for
> > > now...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > > Rodimus had a good idea of what Blackfang was getting at. 
> > > > Rodimus Prime: Yeah, Yggdrasil is the Commander of the Iron 
> > Squad.
> > > If you are thinking that they are not to be fully trusted, I'm 
> > ahead
> > > of you. The Iron Squad have a reputation for being rather ruthless 
> > in
> > > millitary ways, and dont always live up to the principles of other
> > > Maximals and Autobots. I intend to keep a close eye on them. I
> > > wouldn't be surprised if Yggdrasil attempts to take command from me
> > > here. I wont let it happen though. 
> > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang felt like he had to ask.
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang: That Yggdrasil... He is the Iron Squad Commander, 
> > right?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime: Well Blackfang, we'll deal with them 
> > accordingly.
> > > > Let's roll out! 
> > > > > Rodimus accelerates, pulling away from the base, at high speed 
> > for
> > > > their destination. He hadn't said anything, but Nightlight 
> > seemed a
> > > > bit ill. He could just tell. 
> > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Blackfang transformed to wolf mode and ran up to Rodimus.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: It's likely we'll meet Tripreds... What will we do 
> > about
> > > > them?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime(via commlink): That's right. We are just 
> > outside the
> > > > > base. Probably close to you. 
> > > > > > Sure enough, Rodimus soon saw Blackfang and walked up to 
> > him. 
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Ok, Let's get going. 
> > > > > > Roddy transformes to car mode. 
> > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Blackfang responded.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Blackfang: I'm outside of the base. You and Nightlight, you 
> > said?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > > > > > Rodimus recieved Yggdrasil's words over the comm. 
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Will do. 
> > > > > > > He looks to Nightlight. 
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: So much for a peacefull walk. Let's both go 
> > help
> > > > > > Blackfang on this mission. We can talk on the way. 
> > > > > > > Roddy then opens a comm to Blackfang. 
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: This is Commander Prime. I have been 
> > informed
> > > of your
> > > > > > recovery mission. Nightlight and myself will assist you. 
> > Whare
> > > are you
> > > > > > now? 
> > > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Yggdrasil: Rodimus, there's a slight issue. There's a ship 
> > that
> > > landed
> > > > > > > near the Rogues' base and I told them we'd send 
> > reinforcements
> > > > so they
> > > > > > > don't pull any tricks on us. Can you ask Nightlight to go 
> > with
> > > > > > Blackfang?
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > > > > > > Rodimus smiles, and takes her arm. 
> > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: That sounds nice. 
> > > > > > > > Roddy and Nightlight exit the base, and walk, peacefully,
> > > > around the
> > > > > > > perimeter of the base. 
> > > > > > > >  Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@h...> wrote: Nightlight:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Nightlight smiled and followed him "Where we go, 
> > Roddimus?
> > > Do you
> > > > > > > like walk 
> > > > > > > > outsied the base a while?
> > > > > > > >
